  Source   Edit

Utilities for manipulating the AST. These utilities are for internal usage, thus they may change between patch versions.

Types

FilterFn = proc (n: NimNode): NimNode

Procedural type used by filter family of functions.

Take an AST node and produce an another one.

  Source   Edit

Procs

func applyLineInfo(n, info: NimNode): NimNode {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Produce a copy of n with line information from info applied to it and its children.   Source   Edit 
func desym(n: NimNode): NimNode {....raises: [ValueError], tags: [].}
Turn n into an identifier   Source   Edit 
proc exprFilter(n: NimNode; fn: FilterFn): NimNode {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Produce a new tree from n by running fn on all things that looks like an expression tail.

This is because we are working on untyped AST, thus we have little details on whether something is an expression.

  Source   Edit 
proc filter(n: NimNode; fn: FilterFn): NimNode {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Produce a new tree by running fn on all nodes.

If fn returns non-nil, filter will not recurse into that node. Otherwise, the n will be copied and filter will apply fn on all of n children.

  Source   Edit
